content: अर्द् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> [अर्दति, आनर्द, आर्दीत्, अर्दितुं, अर्दित or अर्ण] {@--1@} To afflict, torment; strike, hurt, kill; रक्षःसहस्राणि चतुर्दशार्दीत् <ls>Bk. 12. 56</ls>, see {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} below. {@--2@} To beg, request, ask; निर्गलितांबुगर्भं शरद्घनं नार्दति चातकोपि <ls>R. 5. 17.</ls> {@--3@} To go. {@--4@} To move, be agitated or moved; be scattered (as dust); fly in pieces, dissolve (<ab>Ved.</ab>). (The past participle is usually अर्दित, but अर्ण when the root is preceded by अभि, नि, वि, सं; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. VII. 2. 24-5</ls>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (or {c10c} <ab>P.</ab>) {@--1@} ({%a%}) To afflict, torment, distress; तत एनं महावेगैरर्दयामास तोमरैः <ls>Mb.</ls>; कामार्दित, कोप°, भय° &c. ({%b%}) To strike, hurt, injure, kill; येनार्दिदत् दैत्यपुरं पिनाकी <ls>Bk. 2. 46</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">9. 19</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 90.</ls> {@--2@} To stir up, rouse, agitate, shake vehemently, make agitated or restless. {@--3@} To distort; अर्दयित्वानिलो वक्त्रमर्दितं जनयत्यतः <ls>Suśruta</ls>. --WITH अति to torment excessively, fall upon or attack; अत्यार्दीत् वालिनः पुत्रं <ls>Bk. 15. 115.</ls> --अभि to distress, afflict, pain, oppress; अभ्यर्दितो वृषलः (शीतेन पीडितः) <ls>P. VII. 2. 25</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> --नि <ab>Ved.</ab> to stream forth, flow out. --प्र to overwork, to work or exert oneself beyond measure; to cause to flow away. --प्रति to oppress or press hard in return, assail in return, return an attack. --वि <ab>Ved.</ab> to go or move away; to oppress, harass, pain. ({%--<ab>caus.</ab>%}) to cause to be scattered or dissolved, destroy, annihilate. --सं {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} to pain greatly, wound, distress.
